name: iot-webserver
description: IOT WebServer with Front-end, DB Server and Main Server

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,green,yellow" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "Frontend,DbServer,MainServer" "npm run frontend --silent" "npm run dbserver --silent" "npm run mainserver --silent"
scripts.dev:verbose: concurrently "npm run frontend" "npm run dbserver" "npm run mainserver"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd Front-end && npm install && cd Back-end/dbServer && npm install && cd ../mainServer && npm install
scripts.dev:auto: npm run update-ip && npm run dev
scripts.start:auto: npm run update-ip && npm run dev
